definition: the Way of the King/statecraft/benevolent rule/virtuous as opposed to the Way of Hegemon 霸道
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Literally speaking, for the ravenous person, survival is king.
sentences.chinese: 從字面上來說，對於極餓的人，生存纔是王道。

sentences.english: We will be growing our hair into backcombed bunches and glossing our lips scarlet
sentences.chinese: 把頭髮用梳子倒梳，猩紅脣色王道。

sentences.english: Content is KING, interested readers are potential leads.
sentences.chinese: 內容纔是王道，可以吸引感興趣的讀者和潛在的訂單。

sentences.english: Website, it is content is kingcraft forever.
sentences.chinese: 網站，永遠是內容爲王道。

sentences.english: Land of righteousness, we love and cherish.
sentences.chinese: 王道國土我家鄉，吾人既愛且憶惜。

sentences.english: Engineers were king. Product uber alles.
sentences.chinese: 工程師就是國王，產品就是王道。

sentences.english: Business design just is the kingly way that improves performance.
sentences.chinese: 業務設計纔是提高性能的王道。

sentences.english: It is us above all the content that says normally is kingcraft .
sentences.chinese: 首先就是我們通常所說的內容是王道。

sentences.english: More protein and fruits, and less greasy foods.
sentences.chinese: 別喫的太油膩，豐富蛋白質和新鮮水果纔是王道。

sentences.english: We advocate the kingly way and never bend our knees to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我們提倡王道，絕不屈服於任何人。
對話纔是王道，而並非內容。

sentences.english: "Guoyu" is about ideas and events kingcraft records.
sentences.chinese: 《國語》是關於王道觀念和事件的記錄。

sentences.english: Direct communication where conversation can flow back and forth is still king.
sentences.chinese: 雙向的對話和直接交流仍然是王道。

sentences.english: Everything has its laws, shun its natural is the kingly way.
sentences.chinese: 萬事自有其定律，順其天然纔是王道。

sentences.english: In today's China, English is king.
sentences.chinese: 在當代中國，英語是“王道”。

sentences.english: That ability is right kingly way .

definition: the one and only way/the only proper course to take
the best policy/the best thing one can do in the circumstances
(literary) what is?/what is the meaning of?
Zhengtong Emperor, reign name of sixth Ming Emperor Zhu Qizhen 朱祁鎮|朱祁镇[Zhu1 Qi2 zhen4] (1427-1464), reigned 1435-1449, Temple name Yingzong 英宗[Ying1 zong1]
lit. to paint holding two brushes (idiom); fig. to work on two tasks at the same time/to attack one problem from two angles at the same time
Heaven's law/the natural order of things
